name: Snopa's life
description:
Di dalam game ini kau hanya harus menemukan 5 Ending

di game Snopa'life jika kau tidak ber intraksi dengan benda benda yg ada di sekitar player kau tidak akan mengerti maksud gamenya

jadi di harapkan untuk ber intraksi dengan benda benda di sekitar mu

Jika ada yg error di game ini tolong beri tahu

Ubah kecerahan perangkat kamu menjadi 100 supaya saat memainkan game jadi terlihat jelas

Donasi:https://saweria.co/Arisnopa

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

In this game you only have to find 5 endings

in the game Snopa'life if you don't interact with the objects around the player you won't understand the meaning of the game

so it is expected to interact with objects around you

If there is an error in this game, please let me know

Change the brightness of your devicet to100 so that when playing games it becomes clearer

Donation:https://saweria.co/Arisnopa
